taskbody.context: You can delete model files at any time.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, right-click on the model file that you want to delete.

step.stepresult: The Confirm Resource Delete dialog box is displayed asking you to confirm that you want to delete the model.

step.cmd: Click Yes to confirm the deletion.

If you deleted a model file by mistake, you can undo the deletion. Click on any item in the Project Explorer and select
Edit Undo
or press CTRL + Z on your keyboard.
